name: TR-IRCD Daemon and Services
short_description: TR Ircd is an ircd software based on ircd-hybrid and Bahamut with features: Faked hostnames, Server owned Channels, modules, threads, built-in proxy scanner and httpd for server configuration. It also supports Ipv6 and differenct architectures.
